#summary Credits

= Credits =

[http://sourceforge.net/apps/trac/smartmontools/wiki S.M.A.R.T. Monitoring Tools] utilities have been created by the team lead by Bruce Allen and licensed under GNU GPL 2.0.

The icons used into the program interface are from the following collections:
 # [http://p.yusukekamiyamane.com/ Fugue Icons], created by Yusuke Kamiyamane and licensed under [http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ Creative Commons 3.0];
 # [http://www.famfamfam.com/lab/icons/flags/ Flags], created by Mark James and released under public domain license.

The graphics used to create the logos of hard drives manufacturers and operating systems has been drawn mostly from vector drawings on the site [http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/ Brands Of The World].

The main interface graphics are derived from Orman Clark's works, all available in [http://www.premiumpixels.com/ Premium Pixels].

HDD Guardian and Translation Tool program icons are created using icons from [http://git.gnome.org/ Gnome Icon Theme 2.30.2.1], released under [http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html GNU GPL 2.0 license].
